overview:
Black Jack Productions LLC. We help people communicate their message effectively, across psychological, technological, language and culture barriers. We accomplish this through visual/logical design, and imaginative presentation strategy. I hope that we can also help you! Specialties

Graphic Design, Web Development, Japanese - English Services, Visual communications, SEO Strategy Development, Web Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Localization, Translation, Illustration
